title: CEPI | New Vaccines For A Safer World
description: CEPI is an alliance to finance and coordinate the development of new vaccines to prevent and contain infectious disease epidemics.
cleaned_text: 100 Days Mission CEPI's vision is for the world to be able to respond to the next Disease X with a new vaccine in 100 days. Achieving that goal could defuse the threat of a pathogen with pandemic potential. CEPI's What Will it Take report outlines 5 areas of innovation needed to make delivery of pandemic vaccines within 100 days a reality.
